title: Accessing the Hedgehog vAIDC
summary_markdown:
Set up the Hedgehog Virtual AI Data Center (vAIDC) — the pre-configured GCP lab environment used for all Network Like a Hyperscaler hands-on exercises.

This short course walks you through deploying the vAIDC, connecting to lab services (Grafana, ArgoCD, Gitea, Prometheus), and managing your lab VM's lifecycle. Complete this before starting any hands-on lab exercises in the Network Like a Hyperscaler pathway.

content_blocks.title: Before You Start the Network Like a Hyperscaler Labs
content_blocks.body_markdown: All hands-on lab exercises in the Network Like a Hyperscaler pathway require the Hedgehog Virtual AI Data Center (vAIDC) to be running. Complete this module first — it takes about 20 minutes and only needs to be done once.

content_blocks.title: Ready to Begin
content_blocks.body_markdown: Your vAIDC is running and all lab services are accessible. You're ready to start the Network Like a Hyperscaler pathway — head to Course 1: Foundations & Interfaces to begin.
